website_summaries.verdict: F1 Race Stars is a competent kart racer that fails to go that extra mile and, as a result, outstays its welcome sooner rather than later.
pros: Multiplayer can be funSome good weapons
cons: The aggression of the AI leads to frustrationTracks lack the necessary elements to make them memorableProduct placement sits uncomfortably within the cartoon world

customer_reviews.title: 7 and 11 yo lived it! If you like Mario Kart, this is a great alternative..
customer_reviews.text: My kids Love to play Mario Kart on their DS's. I wanted to get them Mario kart for our xbox 360 for easter. I didn't realize you can't get it for xbox. This seemed like a close alternative with good reviews. It didn't disappoint. Kids loved it. They said it was just like MK. Heard them both say they actually thought it was better. For reference, they are 7 and 11. They had no problems figuring the game out. They put the disk in and started playing right away and had a blast.
customer_reviews.author: KB Tapply

customer_reviews.title: Underrated Gem.
customer_reviews.text: Don't understand why this title isn't more celebrated. Aesthetically beautiful, tons of tracks/drivers to choose from and while the handling isn't perfect it's totally playable. The music isn't particularly memorable, but it isn't horrible either. But forget all that, get four controllers, three other people and a few hours later you'll have no regrets with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Peter D. Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to play.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous MarioKart knockoff and my son loves it, he’s 5 and it’s completely easy for him to understand and he even gets first place occasionally (thank goodness). For the price you can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: MDSarkett

customer_reviews.title: Why such low ratings?
customer_reviews.text: I have fun when I play this game. I also love the fact that I can play multiplayer with friends. I don't know why people gave this game such a low rating. This type of game seems like a time killer something to do to have a bit a fun where you don't have to invest a lot of time trying to finish. I feel like 15 to 30 minutes and it was fun. Unlike me playing COD or some other game where I have been playing for 2 hours...
customer_reviews.author: Kimcheeone

customer_reviews.title: The whole family is satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Entertaining enough for the teenager, appropriate enough for the littles, and kind of a throw back for the adults with it's mario-cart-ness. The whole family is satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Manda S

customer_reviews.title: More frustrating than fun
customer_reviews.text: I play a lot of video games and I can't say that this is one of my favorites. The controls and handling on the vehicles are tight and the overall mechanics of the game are shotty. Not fun as much as it is frustrating. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Frasca

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Start off with this game will not be everyones idea of a great game, limited amount of courses are a little bit of a bad point. Then onto the fun parts, really good fun game in local multiplayer, lots of good power ups and short cuts to frustrate your nemesis (as well as yourself when they get to the power ups first!) Very much like an F1 version of a beloved Nintendo racer, but do not purchase if you are thinking it will be a F1 Racer... it is very much a fun spinoff rather than a serious racer.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Winyard

customer_reviews.title: Mario kart for Xbox 360
customer_reviews.text: The controls are similar to Mario cart, and is a ton of fun to play. My son is 6, and we both enjoy racing each other. Great game.
customer_reviews.author: venom77011

customer_reviews.title: My 5 and 34 yr old love this game
customer_reviews.text: My 5 and 34 yr old love this game. It is very similar to Mario Kart which is what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Total blast!
customer_reviews.text: A ton of fun to play with my 7 &9 year old! Reminds me of Mario cart!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: If youre tired of games that you have to 'learn', this is worth a look. Anyone can play it. You don't have to be a kid with too much time on your hands. It's really nice that the drivers are the actual F1 drivers, especially to an F1 fan.
customer_reviews.author: Luciano

customer_reviews.title: Mario Kart with weird names
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game! My 8 and 11 year old (as well as dad) love it! The only thing is they use real F1 racers in it so it's kind of a crap shoot as to who you pick to race with. Other than that, it's very fun! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MAGA2020

customer_reviews.title: A hoot of a good time.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game for the whole family super gamers to novice easy controls fun and varied levels of diffuculty and many cool tracks to race your friends or online nemesis!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: It's fun racing game!
customer_reviews.text: It's fun racing game. I like to play this game.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Hours of good fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fun version of the popular N64 game everyone loves but for Xbox 360. I really enjoy playing this with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: What a Gaser
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my son, who said that it was a gaser. He loved all of the game. Now I'm content, for it was money well spent. Deliverey of cause was speedy, on time and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Quill

customer_reviews.title: F1 race
customer_reviews.text: My son’s favorite!! Buy it used and its like NEW!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: What a deal for a game that everyone in the group enjoys playing, it's simple play and kind of like Mario Kart only more fun. Don't hesitate..put this in your cart and buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Poorshanutt

customer_reviews.title: Surprising Fun
customer_reviews.text: Surprising game, really. The kids like it a lot. Basically Mario Cart on the Xbox and a good time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ruch

customer_reviews.title: F1 Race Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got this game for my 4 year old grandson and he loves it. Pleased with this purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DB_DIVA

customer_reviews.title: Sort of a campy race game.  Kids seem to like it, though.
customer_reviews.text: Decent enough game on the cheap. The kids seem to like it. Would have been disappointed at $40+ but for around $10 it is a decent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Look585

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Bought this game for our two grand sons which are three and four years old. Our four year old loves it and does really well at racing.The three year old has a little problem staying on the course but loves the power boost.Would recommend this game .
customer_reviews.author: J Latella

customer_reviews.title: It seems like a generic version of mario kart
customer_reviews.text: Gave this a christmas present. The kid likes it so far. It seems like a generic version of mario kart....which in my eyes is pretty neat.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Fun and not expensive
customer_reviews.text: Fun game that is kind of like MarioKart but less expensive. Enjoyed playing with my BF's nephew.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good family fun game!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoying playing this with my 4 year old grandson. He plays this almost as well as I do.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Fun times
customer_reviews.text: Downloaded the demo, & it was pretty fun, so I decided to buy the game. It's definitely a fun game to play, great for kids of all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Qban Cgar

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the entire family, we enjoy competing against each other, trying to bump off the leader to win the race real exciting to the finish.
customer_reviews.author: Clevon Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old daughter wanted to play one of my racing games and it was too hard and she was getting discouraged. so i got this for her and she loves it.

customer_reviews.title: My son and I love this game.
customer_reviews.text: My son and I love this game,fun times for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: F. Nies

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun game for F1 Fans that want a Mario Kart type game. It is harder then expected though.
customer_reviews.author: KPeterson

customer_reviews.title: Great game, perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: Our kids (age 8 and 6) received this as a Christmas present. They love playing it and have had many friends over to play it as well. The game is perfect for kids and is ideally played with the Wireless Speed Wheel. It's also a bit educational in that you can choose from several different countries to race in and that gives you a chance to tell the kids where that country is located.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun, old school game! Hard to find, they had it
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This game is very challenging and SO much fun! A lot like Mario cart, only different.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun little game for if you want to play with friends
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Nice family friendly racing game with 4 player screen
customer_reviews.text: Nice family friendly racing game with 4 player screen. Only down side is that it's very difficult to place 1st. After one month, my children have never placed higher than 3rd

customer_reviews.title: F1 aged young
customer_reviews.text: Fun filled multiplayer action. Really don't think it has much single play value but great multiplayer.

customer_reviews.title: Decent game
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old lies to play it and has fun with it. As an adult I like to play it as well

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Not a game for purists. It is a game after all. Fun yet frustrating at times, but that is what a game is supposed to be. What I do like is that you do not have to be online for multi-player.
customer_reviews.author: MHO

customer_reviews.title: Really fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get a lot of publicity, but this is a really fun game. 4 people can race at once, from the same xbox 360.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great game love the tracks i've played so far and that it has the real drivers. Took it to a friends house played 4 player in a mini championship great game for everyone even the not so experienced in racing everyone enjoyed it. It's the formula 1 version of mario kart. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great for a 6 yr old he really is enjoying it? Fast delivery. Easy to understand. Great christmas gift he loved
customer_reviews.author: COLLEEN H.

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: kids love it, great price , yes i would recomend this game to my freinds kids 5 - up yrs
customer_reviews.author: lj fromga

customer_reviews.title: MY SON, INCREDIBLY HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: On time, perfect to me. We were trying to find this gift long ago, and it was great for our xbox 360
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for younger players
customer_reviews.text: Fun game for myself and my daughter. If you like racing games and want something for a younger player this may be a good buy for you.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: If you liked Mario Kart, you'll love this game. And even if you aren't familiar with Mario Kart you'll get great replay value with this game.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: I got this game for my 6 year old for Christmas and he loves it. I would recommed this game to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: A. Marimpietri

customer_reviews.title: Cheesy but fun
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought this game because we had heard it was a lot like Mario Kart. It is. Although, while Mario turns easily and quickly, these characters dont. Luckily, there are not many big turns on the maps. We like it. Our niece and nephew LOVE it. They play it every time they are over. (They are 8 and 9)
customer_reviews.author: Jo Morris

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Great game. I highly recommended it. Graphics are good, sound is good, game is challenging but fun! Must buy for F1 fans!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Slater

customer_reviews.title: My son and all his friends enjoy it.
customer_reviews.text: Very exciting game! My son and all his friends enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima matos

customer_reviews.title: Horrible game! Stay away from this one!
customer_reviews.text: This game was fun for the first 15 minutes then we you start getting good the difficulty goes from EASY to INSANE! There is no way to adjust the difficulty so if you enjoy having no chance of winning then this game is for you! I'll keep playing Mario Kart!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Best $40 for F1 Fans
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this is the best $40 I have spent in quite awhile. This is such a blatant rip off of Mario Kart but just so much fun. Very very enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: As expected...
customer_reviews.text: Trust the other reviews that say this game just isn't all that deep. Even though I was wanting a "fun" and "light" game to take a break from BLOPS II and BF3, this thing left me feeling mostly "meh" by about the second hour into it. They could have done so much more to polish it up a little - and even on the fastest setting, the racing isn't intense at all. Not even a little bit. Buy another racing game if you want fun AND playable.
customer_reviews.author: owlRnothing

customer_reviews.title: Great game for kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this game, we got it so they could play online with family in another state. Great buy lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom411

customer_reviews.title: A fun game.
customer_reviews.text: Since I'm an xbox user, I've been looking to have a game that has the same features that Mario Kart and I think this one has it. It's really fun an easy to play. Nice graphics and some good fisics, so watch your driving skills. It's not the best racing game out there, but fun enough to play with your friends.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas M. Castro

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR KIDS! HARDEST RACING GAME OF ALL TIME!
customer_reviews.text: HARDEST RACING GAME OF ALL TIME! IM AN ADULT -30 year old SEASON RACER / GAMER AND CANNOT WIN!?!?!?! HOW ARE KIDS SUPPOSED TO!?!?!?!?!? RETURNED!
customer_reviews.author: Otto

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: It's really fun, plenty of action besides driving. You can shot red balloons, go to boxes to get the car restored, etc, etc. Also the F1 pilots cartoons are funny.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game.
customer_reviews.text: Fun game for the whole family! Our 10 year old and 4 year old really love to play this game.
customer_reviews.author: Christen Peterson

customer_reviews.title: For Son
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for son. He got bored of it with in the first couple days. Pretty disappointing. Oh well what do you do
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne Fredricks

customer_reviews.title: As ordered
customer_reviews.text: As ordered is a perfect review. Why? Because the picture shows exactly what I get and because of that I recomend this product and this saler for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: My godson likes a play games. This is a very special game about F1. he likes to play game with her friends
customer_reviews.text: My godson likes a play games. This is a very special game about F1. he likes to play game with her friends

product_meta.title: F1 Race Stars
product_meta.description: F1 RACE STARS is a fast-to-the-fun arcade racing game for all ages featuring the official FORMULA ONE cars, teams and circuits as they’ve never been seen before. Drivers including Lewis Hamilton, Fernando Alonso and Sebastian Vettel have been transformed into personality-packed heroes bursting with charm and character and stunning FORMULA ONE locations have become exhilarating racing theme parks designed for speed and wheel-to-wheel competition. Players will jostle for position on every straight, hairpin, jump and loop-the-loop with chaotic racing and a range of power-ups for players to collect and deploy as they sprint for the chequered flag. Officially licensed to feature the full cast of FORMULA ONE stars and teams and packing an extensive range of game modes, including numerous Championships, Time Trials, 4-player split-screen racing and online multiplayer, F1 RACE STARS takes FORMULA ONE over the top for racing fans of all ages.
feature_bullets: Race circuits that take inspiration from the most exciting tracks from the 2012 FI FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP. FORMULA ONE becomes a fantasy racing theme park featuring jumps, multiple-routes, shortcuts, and more.

Game modes include Free Play so gamers can dive straight into their favorite events and Time Trials where players can set the best time in their household, download friends’ ghost cars and climb online ladders in a test of flat-out speed on every track.

In F1 RACE STARS, the whole cast of FORMULA ONE stars become personality-packed, toonified heroes driving all-new F1 RACE STARS cars representing each team from the 2012 FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP on a range of super-fast, feature-packed circuits.
With up to 4-players competing in split-screen multiplayer, head-to-head competition or coming together in teams, F1 RACE STARS is perfect for sharing the fun with friends and family.

Up to 12 players can also race in online multiplayer and by signing up to RaceNet, the free online extension for Codemasters Racing games, players can track their races, rivals and rewards and join in regular F1 RACE STARS community events.
